title.title: TechZukunft - Shaping the Future with Technology

heroSection.title: Modern Solutions for Your Business
heroSection.subtitle: We are a team of talented developers creating solutions with modern technology

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: TechZukunft is a leading technology consultancy specializing in open-source solutions, custom development, cloud migration, and continuous maintenance for businesses in Germany and beyond.
about.content: At the heart of innovation, we are a team of tech enthusiasts dedicated to transforming businesses through advanced technological solutions. Our expertise spans across consultancy, development, and strategic implementations, making us pioneers in leveraging technology to unlock potential and drive growth. Committed to excellence and fueled by passion, we envision a future where technology creates endless opportunities for our clients.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Innovation, Integrity, Collaboration, propelling us towards excellence in technology.

features.title: Features
features.description: Innovative, efficient, and scalable tech solutions for your unique needs.

services.title: Services
services.description: Customized tech consulting, development, and maintenance to transform and elevate your business.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
